snippet.title: Tipston Salvage - Gameplay Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's the trailer for my debut game as a solo developer!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1358790/Tipston_Salvage/?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=trailer

Tipston Salvage is a strategic couch co-op logistics game for 2-4 players where you operate inconvenient junkyards. I've been working on this game for a long time, but it's finally getting close to being finished! If co-op games where you must communicate and coordinate with friends is your thing, check out the game's Steam page!

Thanks for watching!
